member.name: T:MobileTools.Power.PowerPolicy
member.summary: Representa o controle da política de controle de enercia do dispositivo.

member.name: M:MobileTools.Power.PowerPolicy.EnableUnattendedMode
member.summary: Habilita para a aplicação trabalhar em modo autônomo. Essa opção possibilita que a aplicação continue rodando mesmo com o dispositivo em modo suspenso.

member.name: M:MobileTools.Power.PowerPolicy.DisableUnattendedMode
member.summary: Desabilita o modo autônomo da aplicação.

member.summary: Instância do requerimento.

member.name: T:MobileTools.Power.PowerLineStatus
member.summary:
Power line status.
New in v1.3

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerLineStatus.Offline
member.summary: AC power is offline.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerLineStatus.Online
member.summary: AC power is online.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerLineStatus.BackupPower
member.summary: Unit is on backup power.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerLineStatus.Unknown
member.summary: AC line status is unknown.

member.name: T:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus
member.summary: Defines identifiers that indicate the current battery charge level or charging state information.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus.High
member.summary: Indicates a high level of battery charge.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus.Low
member.summary: Indicates a low level of battery charge.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus.Critical
member.summary: Indicates a critically low level of battery charge.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus.Charging
member.summary: Indicates a battery is charging.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus.NoSystemBattery
member.summary: Indicates that no battery is present.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.BatteryChargeStatus.Unknown
member.summary: Indicates an unknown battery condition.

member.name: T:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus
member.summary:
Indicates current system power status information.
New in v1.3

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.PowerLineStatus
member.summary: AC power status.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BatteryChargeStatus
member.summary: Gets the current battery charge status.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BatteryLifePercent
member.summary: Gets the approximate percentage of full battery time remaining.
member.remarks: TThe approximate percentage, from 0 to 100, of full battery time remaining, or 255 if the percentage is unknown.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BatteryLifeRemaining
member.summary: Gets the approximate number of seconds of battery time remaining.
member.value: The approximate number of seconds of battery life remaining, or -1 if the approximate remaining battery life is unknown.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BatteryFullLifeTime
member.summary: Gets the reported full charge lifetime of the primary battery power source in seconds.
member.value: The reported number of seconds of battery life available when the battery is fullly charged, or -1 if the battery life is unknown.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BackupBatteryChargeStatus
member.summary: Gets the backup battery charge status.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BackupBatteryLifePercent
member.summary: Percentage of full backup battery charge remaining. Must be in the range 0 to 100.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BackupBatteryLifeRemaining
member.summary: Number of seconds of backup battery life remaining.

member.name: P:MobileTools.Power.PowerStatus.BackupBatteryFullLifeTime
member.summary: Number of seconds of backup battery life when at full charge. Or -1 If unknown.

member.name: T:MobileTools.Power.PowerState
member.summary: Possíveis valores que o estado pode assumir.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerState.FullPower
member.summary: Esse é o estado que o dispositivo está ligado e funcionando.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerState.PowerSavings
member.summary: Esse é o estado que o dispositivo é totalmente funcional porém com menor pontência e desempenho que o estado .

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerState.Standby
member.summary: Esse é o estado em que o dispositivo é parcialmente alimentado.

member.name: F:MobileTools.Power.PowerState.PowerOff
member.summary: Esse é o estado que o dipositivo não está ligado.
